channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There are various potholes outside of 76 Rushdene which shakes the house when vehicles go over these- these need to be repaired ASAP., 1st December
item.description:
There are various potholes outside of 76 Rushdene which shakes the house when vehicles go over these and is affecting the resident's sleep and mental wellbeing- these need to be repaired ASAP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Rushdene, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal advert on lamp posts, 1st December
item.description:
For last few months there have been these adverts on lamp posts all along Mcleod Rd SE2. They are every block or two from junction with Howarth Rd and down to end of Mcleod Rd to the roundabout at Knee hill. I see reports of them in SE3 in August but no mention of anything being done. They are an eyesore and should be removed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crumpsall Street, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Complete road blockage., 1st December
item.description:
The temporary traffic light are in the wrong place. They are creating a huge problem, ambulances can't pass towards Queen Elizabeth Hospital. Buses are stuck an hundreds of people frustrated. Something has to change.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stadium Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog Poo on the driveway of 4d Goulton Road, E5 8HA, 1st December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Goulton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Sludgy mushy leaves on pavement and road gutter., 1st December
item.description:
Further to FixMyStreet ref: 8484529. Thanks for the quick response about the leaf mess at 2-18 Maxted Road. I’m struggling to understand why you say no issue was found. The mushy sludge of leaves is still there. It’s not been cleaned up so can’t see why you’ve posted this response. Please clarify. Please rectify.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Maxted Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
